data.text: @SenHydeSmith That's wonderful but your work is not done. Americans also deserve to have secure elections. Pass the American Save Act with Voter ID required please. The polls scream that it's  what "We the People" want! https://t.co/odtSfN8pfT
@SenHydeSmith You left yourself very vulnerable for this election by voting against the bill. Gave your opponent something to run on. Your explanation was weak!
@SenHydeSmith No Save Act???????? I am PISSED!!!! SIGNED PISSED CONSERVATIVE!!!!@
@SenHydeSmith Fair competition in our elections requires you to pass the Save AMERICA Act 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸
@SenHydeSmith You should pass the SAVE act https://t.co/4l9dqVlySR
@SenHydeSmith Pass the Save Act don’t be a coward

@SenHydeSmith Interesting that you called yourself a republican and yet you’re not endorsing the Save Act and you voted nay to end welfare for refugees. Are you sure you’re in the right party? Are you for the American people? Are you gonna secure our elections or what?
